column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My fiance and I came here last night for our eight-year anniversary at the recommendation of a friend who had been here before. The decor is lovely
column2: with dim lights and candles creating an intimate atmosphere. The service was absolutely impeccable -- shout-out to Benjamin
column5: has an amazing mustache! The timing of all of our dishes was prompt but not rushed
column6: and all the details were so on point
column7: down to the warm towel that we received after our oyster course.
